definitions.definition: A pad on which a person can recline and sleep , usually having an inner section of coiled springs covered with foam or other cushioning material then enclosed with cloth fabric .
A form of retaining wall used to support foundations or an embankment
A form of lagging , in particular for boilers.

main_definition: A pad on which a person can recline and sleep , usually having an inner section of coiled springs covered with foam or other cushioning material then enclosed with cloth fabric .
secondary_definitions: A form of retaining wall used to support foundations or an embankment
